thread.title: CIS Roundup: Yannick Harou leads way as Mustangs topple Marauders 46-24
thread.title_full: CIS Roundup: Yannick Harou leads way as Mustangs topple Marauders 46-24 - Winnipeg Free Press

author: The Canadian Press
title: CIS Roundup: Yannick Harou leads way as Mustangs topple Marauders 46-24
text:
HAMILTON - Yannick Harou rushed for 61 yards and three touchdowns to lift the Western Mustangs to a 46-24 victory over the McMaster Marauders on Saturday in CIS football action.
Quarterback Will Finch completed 17-of-25 passing attempts for 261 yards and one interception for Western (8-0). Finch also ran in a touchdown, from one yard out in the second quarter to give the Mustangs an 18-3 lead.
Tom Marshall also had a rushing touchdown.
Asher Hastings was 27-of-41 for 286 yards, two touchdown passes and one interception for the Marauders (6-2), who were held to just three points until the fourth quarter. Hastings also set the record for most touchdown passes in a season with 31 in eight league games.
Aaron Baker, Dan Petermann and Dan Vandervoort had TD's for McMaster.
---
MOUNTIES 37 HUSKIES 6
SACKVILLE, N.B. — Brandon Leyh connected with Josh Hicks for a touchdown as Mount Allison (5-2) won its fourth straight by downing Saint Mary's (0-7).
---
X-MEN 7 AXEMEN 5
ANTIGONISH, N.S. — Tivon Cook found Randy Roseway for a TD-strike 13 seconds into the fourth quarter as St. FX (4-3) rallied for a win over Acadia (3-4).
---
GOLDEN HAWKS 49 GAELS 26
KINGSTON, Ont. — Eric Guiltinan rushed for 107 yards and two touchdowns as Laurier (4-4) defeated Queen's (5-3).
---
LANCERS 44 WARRIORS 14
WINDSOR, Ont. — Casey Wright passed for 254 yards, three touchdowns and an interception as the Lancers (1-6) picked up their first win of the season with a victory over Waterloo (0-7).
---
GRYPHONS 44 RAVENS 12
OTTAWA — Quarterback James Roberts threw four touchdown passes, including two to Jacob Scarfone, as Guelph (7-1) toppled the Ravens (5-3).
---
GEE-GEES 45 VARSITY BLUES 9
OTTAWA — Derek Wendel passed for 564 yards, four TD-strikes and one interception as the Gee-Gees (3-5) routed Toronto (3-5).
---
CARABINS 52 GAITERS 3
SHERBROOKE, Que. — Hugo Henderson threw for 100 yards and two touchdowns as Montreal (5-2) routed Bishop's (1-6).
---
STINGERS 43 REDMEN 41
MONTREAL — Keegan Treloar kicked a 30-yard field goal with zero time remaining to lift Concordia (4-3) over McGill (3-4).
---
DINOS 57 RAMS 7
CALGARY — Andrew Buckley passed for 328 yards and two touchdowns to help power the undefeated Dinos (7-0) over winless Regina (0-7).
---
